meanings.definition: The quality or state of being various or diverse.
meanings.sent1: The variousnesses of colors in the painting made it truly unique.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the variousnesses of flavors in this dish.
meanings.sent3: The variousnesses of shapes in the clouds made them look like animals.
meanings.sent4: Her wardrobe showed the variousnesses of her style and personality.
meanings.sent5: The variousnesses of scents in the garden were overwhelming.

meanings.definition: The presence of a variety of different elements or characteristics.
meanings.sent1: The variousnesses of ingredients in the recipe created a delicious blend.
meanings.sent2: The variousnesses of voices in the choir added depth to the performance.
meanings.sent3: The variousnesses of patterns on the wallpaper made the room look busy.
meanings.sent4: The variousnesses of talents in the team ensured success in every project.
meanings.sent5: The variousnesses of textures in the fabric made it interesting to touch.
